To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

 

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Rani Rahul [ranirahul01@yahoo.com]

Subject: [ADMINS] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT;DMCA NOTICE

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement   
 
abuse@theplanet.com

I, Izhar Malik, certify under penalty of perjury, that I am the original

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are

hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to
the material or items claimed to be infringing.
